title: NIT Karnataka Recruitment 2025 - Apply for 03 Project Assistant Posts
description: National Institute of Technology (NIT) Karnataka has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 03 Project Assistant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the Diploma in Civil Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the NIT Karnataka Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligble candidates can apply on or before the ...
